articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: Amazon plans 3 solar farms and 23 solar rooftop projects in India - Economic Times
articles.description: Amazon's renewable energy projects would total 379 after the addition of the 71 new ones and it expects to generate 50,000 gigawatt hours (GWh) of clean energy from its entire portfolio, equivalent of powering 4.6 million U.S. homes each year.
articles.content:
Ecommerce major, Amazon today announced its first utility-scale renewable energy projects in India three solar farms located in the state of Rajasthan.
These include a 210 MW project to be developed… [+3380 chars]

articles.title: 300 Wipro staff found working with rivals at same time; stand by comment on moonlighting: Rishad Premji - Deccan Herald
articles.description: IT behemoth Wipro has fired 300 staffers after finding out they were moonlighting for its rivals, its chairman, Rishad Premji, said at an event on Wednesday. The news came just a week after rival Infosys warned its employees they could face disciplinary actio…
